body.name: Vorspack Clear Bag Stadium Approved - PVC Clear Purse Clear Crossbody Bag with Front Pocket for Concerts Sports Festivals
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 5 mins
features: Suitable size for carrying belongings: The clear bag is 9 x 6.75 x 2.5 inches and has 2 compartments. 1 main compartment is big enough for you to put a phone, wallet, cosmetics in it, while the front pocket holds little goods such as keys, cash, cards, tickets, and lipsticks

Stadium approved: As a security measure, more and more establishments are enforcing a clear bag policy. Just buy yourself a transparent bag and you can get through a security line easily and quickly without wasting tons of time picking out the things you carry

Quality thicker PVC material: Our clear crossbody bag is made of 0.5 mm PVC material for a longer service life makes it durable and sturdy, it will not fracture even in freezing temperatures and will protect your things from splashing water

Adjustable shoulder strap: The shoulder strap is made of quality nylon which makes it more durable. You can easily adjust the shoulder strap for different styles like a crossbody bag and shoulder bag. The length can be adjusted from 30 inches to 50 inches

Multi-purpose for all situations: Vorspack clear purse is completely stadium approved. You can go with it for many situations such as stadiums, concerts, festivals, raves, airports, sports events, and any outdoor activities. It is also convenient for you to check everything you need to be ready

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vorspack Clear Bag for stadium Are you looking for a suitable clear bag that is stadium-approved? This Vorspack clear crossbody bag is a great choice for women or men. You can go with it for many situations at stadiums, concerts, and sports events, you can get through a security line easily and quickly without wasting tons of time picking out the things you carry. transparent bag Size: 9 x 6.75 x 2.5 inches Weight: 190g/6.7oz With a clear purse, you can pass through security faster Thick adjustable shoulder strap Soft nylon material and reinforced stitching make the bag more durable and wearable 2 departments Separate pockets keep things apart and organized, meeting your storage need Constructed with heavy-duty 0.5 mm PVC Thicker PVC material would not crack even in cold weather and protect your items from splashed water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great option when a clear bag is required.
reviews.reviewText: A simple, north-south crossbody that is surprisingly roomy. I like that there is a zippered slip pocket in the front. Love the adjustable strap -- Vorspack has the longest length that I've found in this style bag. Material is not flimsy. I don't think I'll be passing this down to younger generations, but I'll certainly be able to use it for a few years. Price is more than reasonable. If you're an avid concert-goer or attend lots of sporting events, this bag is a must.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bag was great for a concert I went to. Easy to get through security. Comfortable to wear. Just the right size for my wallet, phone, and a few extras. I also got compliments on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear bag policy
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for clear bag policy event. Nice medium size and can fit most things but isn’t too big.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clear bag but also stylish
reviews.reviewText: This bag works great if you are trying to find a simple bag to hold all of your necessities for a game or concert at a stadium. It easily meets stadium guidelines and is easy to style and wear. It has enough space to hold your phone, wallet, key, sunglasses, and a few smaller items and it has a zipper pouch on the from that can hold a few smaller items as well. It’s easy to carry and can be worn over the shoulder or cross body which is nice and it was fairly comfortable. If it’s hot out or if you are in short sleeves the strap could get a little itchy but if you are in a spot where you could take it off when you get to your seat you should be okay comfort wise. The plastic is a little sticky and can kind of suction together when you first use it so I would recommend taking something and trying to stretch the plastic a little before first use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for taking to a stadium
reviews.reviewText: I needed a clear purse for a Pink concert at a stadium, and it was perfect. Big enough for items I needed at the concert but small enough that I could put it on my shoulder across my body to my hip and not worry about it. The strap was easy to adjust. The zippers worked fine. And the small pocket on the front of the purse allowed me to put small items where I could easily get them. The ushers at the stadium let me in with no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game day ready!!
reviews.reviewText: Great product for the price:1) Straps long enough to make it a cross body bag2) Strong and durable3) Used outside, zipper pocket to separate cell phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for NFL Stadium Games
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bag to attend an NFL game at Sofi Stadium. No issues getting in with it. It’s also very durable and you can adjust the strap to wear as a crossbody. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really good bag for price. It was a decent size, I was concerned it may be small, but it fit everything I needed with some room. I was even able to stick a regular plastic water bottle inside, couldn't zip but it was nice to be able to have a drink.Simple, started using when I run errands.

I used the bag during the Taylor Swift concert in the states where it’s mandatory to have clear bags. Worked well and got through security quickly. The front pocket is a great size for your phone or keys for easy reach and the overall size was perfect for the occasion.
